sentence.Network_en: The most valuable item on show will be a Picasso drawing.
sentence.Network_cn: 展览会上最贵重的展品是毕加索的一幅素描。

sentence.Network_en: This is one of the most valuable lessons I learned.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是我所学到的最宝贵的教训.

sentence.Network_en: The most valuable find of all was the ship's log book.
sentence.Network_cn: 在所发现的东西中,最珍贵的就是那艘船的日志.

list.abs: ...游戏开发。我们想做世界上最棒的游戏，而他们总是说：“不不，我们要做的是最有价值(most valuable)的游戏。”你知道，这其实并 …
will become my most valuable treasure ., 我最宝贵的财富.

means.word_mean: 1. designating the player judged to be the most important to the sport;
